column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Having lived in Barcelona for six months
column2: I know a thing or two about tapas. And this place
column4: one of my favorite places to go. Makes me feel like I'm sitting at my favorite tapas bar back in Barri Gotic. Green olives
column8: they have it all! Fun atmosphere
column9: good prices. I still have yet to try the paella
column10: though! I sometimes forget where I am
